title: Edum ariyAdavan
sahitya:
Edum ariyAdavan pOl iruppadum En murugA pEdaiyEn unpAl kAdal koNDiruppadai


anupallavi

  kAdal koLLuvadum Or bADhakam tAn AghumO vEdanai tAn nI adarkku vidikkum aparAdhamO


caraNam    nAthan nI tAn enru nambi irukkum ennai AdarikkAdu innum sOdikkum nItiyennE
mAdhavam puriyAda pOdum nAn un pAda prasAdam pENum bhaktan Ana pOdum
